title: The Convict 1951 (French film) Pierre Gay, Lucien Nat, Lili Bontemps

sources.title: The Convict 1951 (French film) Pierre Gay, Lucien Nat, Lili Bontemps
sources.description:
Marcel (Frank Villard), a wrongly accused chap, finds himself in a penal colony, but his spirit remains unbroken as he plots his escape. With cunning and grit, Marcel navigates treacherous terrain and outsmarts the guards, proving that even behind bars, freedom is a dish best served with a side of daring.

Original title: Le bagnard (1951)

Colorized version:  https://youtu.be/FWLBkWN-5SM


Director & Writer: Willy Rozier
Actors: Pierre Gay, Lucien Nat, Lili Bontemps
Genres: French cinema, Drama,

This film is available with original French audio, and subtitles in many languages.
